entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:28 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Fog dissipating. High minus 3.
